mt: During the 3rd Vietnam National Digital Enterprise Development Forum, two main meetings were held to discuss the topics of digital enterprises and the digital transformation of the country, digital enterprises and the economic recovery and development during and after the cholera epidemic.

src: 通信传媒部部长阮孟雄表示，2021年，尽管新冠肺炎疫情持续蔓延，但越南数字技术企业的数量和营业收入仍保持增长势头，达近10 % 。
mt: Vietnam’s Minister of Communications and Media, Nguyễn Văn Thiệu, said that in 2021, the number and revenues of digital-technology enterprises in Vietnam would continue to grow at a rate of nearly 10%, despite the persistent spread of the new crown pneumonia epidemic.

src: 2021年，越南典型数字产品数量耕作，集中解决越南面临的各大难题，许多数字产品已走出国门，越南数字技术排名已提升。
mt: By 2021, Vietnam's typical digital products will be cultivated in quantity, focusing on solving the major problems facing Vietnam, many digital products have gone out of the country, and Vietnam's digital technology ranking has been upgraded.

src: 阮孟雄部长呼吁数字技术企业负起发展国家数字化转型平台的责任，担当发展这些国家数字平台的任务就是担当国家使命。
mt: Minister Nguyen called on digital technology enterprises to take responsibility for developing national digital transformation platforms. The task of developing these national digital platforms is the national mission.

src: 在论坛上，各部门和国家机关领导，正在研究、发展、应用、转让数字技术的企业、组织和个人分享了动员和汇集全社会资源来发展越南技术企业，携手推动国家数字化转型，朱慧疫情后经济复苏等的各突破性设想和解决方案。
mt: At the forum, enterprises, organizations and individuals, headed by various departments and state agencies, who are researching, developing, applying and transferring digital technology, shared their ideas and solutions on mobilizing and pooling all social resources to develop Vietnam's technological enterprises, working hand in hand to promote the digital transformation of the country and economic recovery after the Zhuhui epidemic.

src: 范明正总理在论坛上发表讲话时强调，数字化转型是世界必由之路，是发展的客观需求。
mt: Speaking at the forum, Mr. Fan stressed that the digital transformation is a must for the world and an objective requirement for development.

src: 数字化转型已成为全球性问题，数字化转型服务全民，因此需动员全民参与。
mt: The digital transformation has become a global problem, and the digital transformation serves the whole population, so it is necessary to mobilize the participation of the whole population.

src: 人民和企业是数字化转型的核心、主体、目标和动力。
mt: The people and enterprises are the core, the subject, the goal and the motive force of the digital transformation.

src: 因此，一切政策需为了人民和企业。
mt: Therefore, all policies must be for the people and enterprises.

src: 范明正总理强调，数字化转型需体现民族精神，需以内力为主、战略、长期和决定性因素，外力为重要和突破口。
mt: Mr. Fan stressed that the digital transformation needs to reflect the national spirit.It needs internal forces as the main, strategic, long-term and decisive factors, and external forces as important and breakthroughs.

src: 他同时认为，数字化转型需驱动向纵深发展和可持续发展，参与新冠肺炎疫情防控、经济复苏和发展、应对其后变化、克服自然资源枯竭现象，助力绿色转型、发展绿色能源。
mt: At the same time, he believes that the digital transformation must drive deeper development and sustainable development, participate in the prevention and control of pneumonia outbreaks, economic recovery and development, cope with subsequent changes, overcome the depletion of natural resources, and assist in the green transformation and the development of green energy.

src: 数字化转型需参与保护和弘扬有关国家文化价值、历史传统、国家风土人情等的数据库建立工作，推动银行、税务、土地管理和开发数据库以及物流等领域数字化转型。
mt: The digital transformation should involve the establishment of databases on the protection and promotion of national cultural values, historical traditions, national customs and traditions, and promote the digital transformation in such areas as banking, taxation, land management and development databases, and logistics.

src: 数字化转型的最大目标是让人民更幸福，国家日益繁荣发展。
mt: The biggest goal of the digital transformation is to make people happier and the country more prosperous.

src: 范明正总理要求各级政府、各级机关和企业在发展数字技术中需加大领导和指导力度，提高对数字化转型的认识，继续制定和完善关于数字化转型的体制，加强国家管理度和本着尊重、沟通、倾听、积极和主动的精神上推动对数字技术企业发展。
mt: Premier Fan Mingzheng called on governments, organs and enterprises at all levels to step up leadership and guidance in the development of digital technology, raise awareness of the digital transformation, continue to formulate and improve the system for the digital transformation, strengthen state management and promote the development of digital technology enterprises in the spirit of respect, communication, listening, active and proactive.

src: 论坛期间，范明正总理出席了2021年“越南制造”优秀数字产品奖颁奖仪式及“越南制造”数字产品展开幕式。
mt: During the forum, the Prime Minister attended the award ceremony of "Vietnamese Manufacturing" Excellence Digital Product Award 2021 and the opening ceremony of "Vietnamese Manufacturing" Digital Product Exhibition.

src: 48小时核酸阴性、设“缓冲区 ” 国务院联防联控机制发文要求加强口岸城市疫情防控-新华网
mt: 48 hours of nucleic acid negative, establish " buffer zone " State Council Joint Defense Joint Control Mechanism requests to strengthen port city epidemic prevention and control - Zhejiang website

src: 新华社北京12月11日电（记者董瑞丰、顾天成）国务院联防联控机制日前印发关于加强口岸城市新冠肺炎疫情防控工作的通知，要求近期离开陆地边境口岸城市（与香港、澳门有口岸相连的除外）人员需持有48小时内核酸检测阴性证明，前往陆地边境口岸城市人员抵达后至少进行1次核酸检测。
mt: The State Council's Joint Defense and Control Mechanism issued a notice on strengthening the control and prevention of pneumonia outbreaks in port cities on December 11, Xinhua news agency reported.It requires persons who recently leave land border port cities (except those connected with ports in Hong Kong and Macao) to have negative certificates for testing nucleic acid within 48 hours, and carry out at least one test of nucleic acid after arriving at the land border port city.

src: 根据通知，上述要求的时间范围为，从各省区市确定口岸城市范围并公告之日起，至2022年3月15日。
mt: According to the notice, the above-mentioned requirement is for a period of time from the date when the port city scope is determined and announced by the provinces and municipalities to March 15, 2022.

src: 此外，通知还提出，有条件的口岸城市可研究在辖区内设置疫情防控缓冲区。
mt: In addition, the Notice also proposes that a port city subject to conditions may study the establishment of epidemic prevention and control buffer zones within its jurisdiction.

src: 国家卫生健康委疾病预防控制局有关负责人介绍，对于一些口岸城市来说，跨境边贸是当地主要经济支柱，双方边民往来频繁。
mt: For some port cities, cross-border border trade is the main economic pillar of the local economy, and people from both sides travel frequently, the head of the Bureau of Disease Prevention and Control of the State Health Commission said.

src: 实行分区差异化管理政策，由一道防控外溢防线变为两道防线，有望实现关口前移，压缩疫情外溢风险，以最小社会影响、最低社会成本实现疫情防控最大成效。
mt: By implementing a differentiated management policy for the sub-divisions, from one outbreak prevention and control line to two outbreak prevention and control lines, it is hoped that the frontier will be moved forward, the outbreak prevention and control risks will be reduced, and the greatest effect will be achieved with the least social impact and the lowest social cost.

src: 近期我国发生多起本土聚集性疫情，均是境外疫情经口岸城市输入。
mt: Recently, there have been many cases of indigenous aggregation epidemics in China, all of which are imported from overseas through port cities.

src: 上述通知指出，这暴露出一些地方疫情监测预警不及时、高风险岗位人员闭环管理不落实、定期核酸检测流于形式、冷链物品各环节消杀不到位、集中隔离场所管理不规范、疫情应急处置不够科学精准等问题。
mt: The above-mentioned notice points out that this exposes some local epidemic surveillance early warning in a timely manner, closed-circuit management of high-risk position personnel is not implemented, regular flow of nucleic acid testing in the form, cold chain items in various links can not be eliminated, centralized isolation site management is not standardized, epidemic emergency management is not scientifically accurate, and so on.

src: 通知要求，从完善口岸城市疫情防控机制、健全疫情监测预警体系、落实边境管控措施等9个方面着力，加快补齐口岸城市防控短板弱项，毫不放松、科学精准做好防控工作，织密扎牢外防输入防线。
mt: In response to the notification request, nine aspects such as improving the mechanism for the prevention and control of epidemics in port cities, improving the early warning system for the monitoring of epidemics, and implementing border control measures have been put into practice.

src: 通知强调，各口岸城市要将疫情防控与民生保障工作同步研究、同步部署，公布并畅通民生保障热线，定期排查基本生活物资供应、价格等方面的苗头隐患，及时解决和主动回应群众反映的突出问题。
mt: The notification stressed that port cities should conduct simultaneous research and deployment of epidemic prevention and control and the protection of people's livelihoods, announce and open the hotline for people's livelihoods protection, regularly identify hidden problems in the supply and price of basic necessities of life, and promptly solve and actively respond to the outstanding problems reported by the public.

src: 根据通知，其中所指的口岸城市包括开放的陆路、水路、航空口岸所在县（市、区、旗 ） 、 所在市（地、州、盟）及所在直辖市，具体范围由各省（自治区、直辖市）根据疫情防控需要确定并及时公告。
mt: According to the notification, the port cities referred to therein include the counties (cities, districts, flags) where the open land, water and air ports are located, the cities (territories, states, unions) where the ports are located and the cities directly under the Central Government.

src: 南非医生：奥密克戎传播力虽强 但多为轻症
mt: South African Doctor: Omicron is contagious, but mostly mild

src: 南非许多医生和医疗专家认为，新冠病毒奥密克戎变种所致病症比德尔塔变种更为轻微，虽然传播速度更快。
mt: Many South African doctors and medical experts believe that the new crown virus Omicron strain causes less disease than the Delta strain, although it spreads at a faster rate.

src: 据美联社报道，随着奥密克戎变种在南非的传播，南非豪登省的一个五千多名医生组成医师组织报告说，他们目前治疗的新冠病人出现的症状都比较轻微，例如身体疼痛和咳嗽等与流感类似的症状。
mt: A group of more than 5,000 doctors in South Africa's Haute-Garonne province reported that they are treating new crown patients with mild symptoms such as body pain and coughing that resemble influenza, the Associated Press reported.

src: 该组织总监安本·皮莱（Unben Pillay）医生说，他每天都要看几十名病人，但是还没有任何病人需要住院。
mt: Dr. Unben Pillay, the organization's director, says he sees dozens of patients every day, but no patients need to be hospitalized.

src: 皮莱说 ： “ 他们能够在家里控制疾病，大多数人在隔离10至14天内康复 。 ”
mt: “They were able to control the disease at home,” Pillay said, “and most recovered within 10 to 14 days of isolation.”

src: 他说，这包括老年患者和那些有健康问题的患者，这些人群本来更容易因冠状病毒感染而陷入重症。
mt: He says this includes the elderly and those with health problems who are more likely to become seriously ill from coronary virus infections.

src: 他说，与之相比，在上一波的德尔塔疫情中，他治疗的新冠患者“呼吸困难，血氧水平低。
mt: In contrast, he said, in the last wave of the Delta outbreak, he treated patients with new crowns who had "difficulty breathing and low blood oxygen levels.

src: 许多人几天内就要住院 ” 。
mt: Many will be hospitalized in a few days.”

src: 在南部非洲首次报告奥密克戎变异毒株后的两周内，其他医生也分享了类似的经验。
mt: Other doctors shared similar experiences two weeks after the first report of Omicron mutant strains in southern Africa.

src: 虽然收集足够的数据还需要几个星期的时间，但医生的观察和早期证据提供了一些线索。
mt: Although it will take several weeks to collect enough data, doctors' observations and early evidence provide some clues.

src: 据南非国家传染病研究所总结：在近几周住院的新冠患者中，只有30%是严重病症，是前一波疫情重症比例的一半；平均住院时间从8天缩短到2.8天；近期的新冠患者中，仅有3%死亡，而在南非早期爆发的病例中，死亡比例达20 % 。
mt: According to the South African National Institute of Infectious Diseases, only 30% of new coronary heart disease patients hospitalized in recent weeks were severe, half the rate of the previous wave; the average length of hospitalization was reduced from 8 to 2.8 days; and only 3% of new coronary heart disease patients died recently, compared to 20% in early-onset outbreaks in South Africa.

src: 非洲健康研究所所长威廉·哈内科姆（Willem Hanekom）引用国家传染病研究所的数据和其他报告说 ： “ 目前，几乎所有的迹象都表明，这是一种较温和的疾病 。 ”
mt: “At present, there are almost all indications that it is a mild disease,” said Willem Hanekom, director of the African Health Institute, citing data from the National Institutes of Infectious Diseases and other reports.

src: 他还说 ： “ 现在还是早期，我们需要获得后期数据。
mt: "It's still early days and we need to get the later data," he added.

src: 通常情况下，住院和死亡发生的时间较晚，而我们进入这一波疫情的时间只有两周 。 ”
mt: Normally, hospitalizations and deaths occur later, and we only enter this epidemic in two weeks.”

src: 与此同时，世界各地的科学家正在观察病例数和住院率，同时测试目前的疫苗和治疗方法的效果。
mt: Meanwhile, scientists around the world are observing the number of cases and hospitalization rates while testing the effectiveness of current vaccines and treatments.

src: 尽管德尔塔仍然是全世界主要的新冠病毒株，但奥密克戎病例正在数十个国家出现，其中南非为疫情中心。
mt: Although Delta is still the world's leading new crown virus strain, Omicron cases are occurring in dozens of countries, with South Africa as the centre of the epidemic.

src: 据卫生官员介绍，豪登省在12月的第一周发现的新病例增加了400 % ， 测试显示，奥密克戎变体的病例占90%以上。
mt: According to health officials, the number of new cases detected in the first week of December in the province of Hohenzollern increased by 400%, with tests showing more than 90% of cases of Omikyong variants.

src: 教育思考：大学考试如何让“学霸 ” “ 学渣”各得其所-新华网
mt: Educational Thinking: How the University Examination Makes the " Hegemon " and the " Leftovers " Each Get Its Own - Official Website

src: 兰州交通大学3名学生给校领导写信，反映对大学考试的困惑，并提出提高考试难度，变换考试题型，让考试真正体现学生实际水平的诉求。
mt: Three students from Lanzhou Jiaotong University wrote a letter to the head of the university, reflecting the confusion about the university examination, and proposed to improve the difficulty of the examination, changing the examination questions, so that the examination really reflects the students' actual level of aspiration.

src: 的确，长期以来，大学考试都是一个“热门话题 ” 。
mt: Indeed, university exams have long been a “hot topic.”

src: 在大学校园，学生来自五湖四海，能力水平各不相同，再加之学习程度不一，学习的情况千差万别。
mt: On the university campus, students come from all over the world, with varying levels of ability, plus varying degrees of learning and studying conditions.

src: 对于具有如此多元特征的群体进行考核，存在不同感受，在所难免。
mt: It is inevitable that there will be different feelings when evaluating groups with such diverse characteristics.

src: 当然，如果考试试题题型单一、重复率高，题目过于简单，必然会造成另一种截然不同的感受。
mt: Of course, if the test questions are of a single type, repetition rates are high, the subject is too simple, it will inevitably cause a completely different feeling.

src: 不用功的学生，可能考前集中突击就能及格，如若再想其他办法，有可能达到事半功倍的效果。
mt: Students who do not study hard may be able to pass the exam by concentrating on assault. If you think of other ways, it is possible to achieve half the effect.

src: 如此一来，就出现“学渣”平时不投入也能过关、甚至得了高分 ； “ 学霸”平时从不落课，作业、笔记样样好，考试也没高出多少的“怪现状 ” 。
mt: In this way, “study residue” can pass and even score high if it is not invested in; “study bully” never drops out of class, has good homework and notes, and does not score high on exams.

src: 这样看来，兰州交大的学生反映大学考试中存在的问题并非毫无来由，相信这种状况也不只兰州交大存在。
mt: In this way, the students of Lanzhou University reflect the problems that exist in the university examination is not without reason, believe that the situation does not exist only Lanzhou University.

src: 从这层意义上讲，要为这3名写信直陈的学生点赞。
mt: In this sense, praise the three students who wrote the letter.

src: 其实，上过大学的人都清楚，突击备考、想各种办法从老师处“套取”考题，争取划考试范围，求得考前得到“重点辅导”的现象并不少见，甚至在考试中夹带小抄、考后求老师高抬贵手的情况也不是奇闻。
mt: In fact, everyone who has attended university knows that it is not uncommon for students to rush to prepare for exams, think of various ways to "take up" exam questions from their teachers, try to delineate the scope of the examination, and seek "focused guidance" before the examination. It is also not uncommon for students to take notes in the examination and ask their teachers to raise their hand after the examination.

src: 在笔者看来，作为一种教学质量评估导向，衡量一所大学考试的合格与否，更在于教师对教与学的全面把握，以及在此基础上的科学命题。
mt: In the author's view, as a kind of teaching quality assessment guideline, the measurement of a university examination's qualification or not lies more in the teacher's comprehensive grasp of teaching and learning, and the scientific proposition on this basis.

src: 进入大学本科阶段，专业开始细分，很多专业课程以基础知识为主。
mt: In the undergraduate stage of university, the majors begin to be subdivided, and many of the major courses are based on basic knowledge.

src: 毋庸置疑，是否全面掌握一个学科的基本知识点，是大学考试要考察的内容。
mt: There is no doubt that mastering the basic knowledge of a subject is the content of the university examination.

src: 而本科知识基本都是学科基础理论和基本常识，从知识点而言，变化的空间并不大，基本是固定的。
mt: The undergraduate knowledge is basically the basic theory and common sense of the subject, the space of change from the point of knowledge is not large, it is basically fixed.

src: 就像有教师所言 ， “ 20年前学大学数学的基本知识，现在还在学，还是重点 。 ”
mt: As one teacher put it, “The basics of university mathematics, 20 years ago, are still being studied, or the focus.”

src: 但知识点基本不变，并不代表考试题型单一、试题重复。
mt: However, the knowledge point is basically unchanged, does not mean that the test question type is single, the test question repeated.

src: 在很多大学，考试一般都会组成出题组，再由学科资深教师统筹组成试卷，考试阅卷也由承担该科的全体老师参与，这样就能在一定程度上克服试题重复的情况。
mt: In many universities, examinations are usually composed of a group of questions, then by senior subject teachers to co-ordinate the examination papers, examination papers also by all teachers of the subject participate, so as to overcome to some extent the repetition of the examination questions.

src: 但要拟出一套符合教与学实际的试题，题目根据学生学习整体情况，难易呈正态分布，还需综合掌握教学情况，全面分析学生学习的程度，从而使考试命题对难易、题型有动态把握，既能突出基础知识考察，又能兼顾能力考查，同时对题型进行创新设计。
mt: However, to prepare a set of test questions in accordance with teaching and learning practice, the subjects are difficult to present a normal distribution according to the student's overall learning situation, it is also necessary to master the teaching situation comprehensively, comprehensively analyze the degree of student's learning, so as to make the test proposition to the difficulty and the type of the dynamic grasp, can highlight the basic knowledge examination, but also take into account the ability examination, and at the same time carry out the innovative design of the type of the question.

src: 考试是大学教育的指挥棒，有什么样的考试，学生就会有相应的备考方案，长此以往，将影响大学教育的成效。
mt: The examination is the commanding rod of university education, what kind of examination, students will have the corresponding preparation program, will affect the university education's effectiveness in the long run.

src: 对于学生的建议信，兰州交大校方高度重视，已在全校部署了整改的方案。
mt: To the students' letter of recommendation, Lanzhou Jiao University attaches great importance, has deployed the correction program in the whole school.

src: 要求各教学单位组织教师开展研讨和课程结课考试对照自查，制定考试试卷命题及相关制度，同时加强对考试试卷命题及审核环节的监督与检查，细化成绩评定，加强课程教学各环节的全面考核。
mt: Teaching units shall be required to organize teachers to carry out research and self-examination of course-ending examinations against each other, to formulate examination questionnaire propositions and related systems, and at the same time to strengthen the supervision and examination of examination questionnaire propositions and examination links, to fine-tune the assessment of achievements, and to strengthen the comprehensive examination of all links of course teaching.

src: 从机制上解决试题类型单一、题目重复等问题是大学考务需要面对的议题，当然需要出台相应的制度，但功夫贵在日常，需要教师对教学情况的全面掌握，不单要吃透教学内容，更须吃透学生学习情况，两头吃透，教与学将更好对接，形成良性互动，考试也将更加符合实际，从而让“学霸”和“学渣”各得其所。
mt: It is important to note that in order for a teacher to have a complete grasp of the teaching situation, he must not only digest the teaching content, but also digest the student's learning situation, and digest both the teaching and learning situation, so that the teaching and learning will interact better and form a positive interaction, and the examination will be more in line with the actual situation, so that the hegemon and the scum will get their way.

src: “智汇潇湘”2021中国国际轨道交通和装备制造产业人才峰会开幕 - 滚动新闻 - 湖南日报网 - 华声在线
mt: "China International Railway Transport and Equipment Manufacturing Industry Talent Summit Opens in Shanghai in 2021" (Press release).

src: 湖南日报12月10日讯（全媒体记者 周帙恒）9日 ， “ 智汇潇湘”2021中国国际轨道交通和装备制造产业人才峰会在株洲开幕。
mt: China's international rail transportation and equipment manufacturing industry talent summit to be held in Zhuzhou China's international rail transportation and equipment manufacturing industry talent summit to be held in Zhuzhou will be held in Zhuzhou on December 9, Hunan Daily reported on December 10.

src: 省委常委、省委组织部部长王成出席启动仪式并讲话。
mt: Wang Cheng, member of the Standing Committee of the Party Committee and Minister of the Organization Department of the Party Committee, attended the launching ceremony and spoke.

src: 王成指出，举办人才峰会是贯彻落实中央人才工作会议和省第十二次党代会精神的重要举措，彰显了湖南重视人才、渴求人才、用好人才的真心诚意。
mt: Mr. Wang said that holding the talent summit is an important step in implementing the spirit of the Central Talent Working Conference and the Twelfth Provincial Party Congress, which underscores Hunan's sincerity in attaching importance to talents, seeking talents and using good talents.

src: 湖南有识才爱才敬才的优良传统、助力人才发展的广阔平台、实现美好生活的环境条件，近年来深入实施人才引领发展战略，以芙蓉人才行动计划为牵引，构建起引育留用全链条人才工作格局，成为了人才成长成就的沃土、创新创业的热土、宜居宜业的乐土。
mt: In recent years, Hunan Province has implemented the talent-led development strategy in depth, taking the action plan for talented people as a guide, and constructed a work pattern for nurturing and retaining talented people with full chains, which has become a fertile land for talented people's growth achievements, a hot land for innovation and entrepreneurship, and a happy land for people to live and work in.

src: 当前，湖南正在全面落实“三高四新”战略定位和使命任务，将进一步广开引贤纳才之门，为人才创新创业出台更优政策、集中更多资源、创造更好条件，期待各界优秀人才共同为湖南高质量发展聚智汇力。
mt: At present, Hunan is fully implementing the "three new high schools and four new high schools" strategy positioning and mission tasks, will further widely open the door to talented people, introduce better policies for talented people's innovation and entrepreneurship, concentrate more resources, create better conditions, and expect excellent talents from all walks of life to join forces for Hunan's economic development.

src: 活动现场设置了长沙、株洲、湘潭展馆和湖南自贸试验区展馆，省科技厅、省工信厅、省人社厅发布了先进制造相关产业科技创新重点需求清单、智能制造产业人才需求目录、博士后流动站智能制造产业青年人才需求目录。
mt: The exhibition halls of Changsha, Zhuzhou, Xiangtan and Hunan Autonomous Trade Test Zone were set up at the venue of the event.The Ministry of Science and Technology, Ministry of Industry and Communications, and Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development issued a list of key requirements for technological innovation in advanced manufacturing-related industries, a directory of talent requirements in the intelligent manufacturing industry, and a directory of talent requirements for young talents in the post-doctoral mobile station in the intelligent manufacturing industry.

src: 中国中车、中联重科、远大科技等48家大型企业现场揽才，近千名相关专业应届毕业生、社会人才参与了人才项目对接。
mt: China Central Automotive Corporation, China Union Heavy Industries, Far-East University of Science and Technology and other 48 large enterprises field recruited talents, nearly 1,000 relevant professional graduates and social talents participated in talent matching projects.

src: 人民日报评论员 ： “ 十四五”实现良好开局 — — 论学习贯彻中央经济工作会议精神-新华网
mt: People's Daily Commentator: "The Fourteenth Five-Year" to Achieve a Good Start--On the Study and Implementation of the Spirit of the Central Economic Working Conference

src: 新华社北京12月11日电 人民日报12月12日评论员文章 ： “ 十四五”实现良好开局 — — 论学习贯彻中央经济工作会议精神
mt: Xinhua, December 11, 2007 People's Daily, December 12, 2007 Commentator's Article: "The Fourteenth and Fifth Five-Year Plans for a Good Start--On Learning and Implementing the Spirit of the Central Economic Working Conference"

src: “实现了‘十四五’良好开局 ” ， 12月8日至10日举行的中央经济工作会议高度评价一年来我国经济社会发展取得的成绩。
mt: The Central Economic Working Conference, held from December 8 to 10, highly evaluated the achievements of China’s economic and social development over the past year.

src: 习近平总书记在会上发表重要讲话，深刻总结2021年经济工作，深入分析当前经济形势，对2022年经济工作作出重大部署，为我们做好明年经济工作，迎接党的二十大胜利召开，指明了前进方向、提供了根本遵循。
mt: At the meeting, the President-in-Office of the Communist Party of China delivered an important speech, profoundly summarized the economic work in 2021, analyzed the current economic situation in depth, made major deployments to the economic work in 2022, and gave us a good start to the economic work next year and to the Party's 20th victory convocation.

src: 我们隆重庆祝中国共产党成立一百周年，正式宣布全面建成小康社会、实现第一个百年奋斗目标，开启全面建设社会主义现代化国家、向第二个百年奋斗目标进军新征程。
mt: We solemnly celebrate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China, officially proclaim China's economic and social development, achieve the first-hundred-year goal of striving for socialism, launch the comprehensive construction of a socialist modernized country, and embark on a new journey towards the second-hundred-year goal of striving for socialism.

src: 我们召开党的十九届六中全会，总结党的百年奋斗重大成就和历史经验，通过百年党史上第三个历史决议《中共中央关于党的百年奋斗重大成就和历史经验的决议 》 ， 这是新时代中国共产党人牢记初心使命、坚持和发展中国特色社会主义的政治宣言，是以史为鉴、开创未来、实现中华民族伟大复兴的行动指南。
mt: We have convened the Sixth Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the Party to sum up the great achievements and historical experience of the Party's hundred years of struggle and adopted the Third Historical Resolution of the CPC Central Committee on the Great Achievements and Historical Experience of the Party's Hundred Years of Struggle.

src: 一年来，世界百年未有之大变局和新冠肺炎疫情全球大流行交织影响，外部环境更趋复杂严峻，国内新冠肺炎疫情防控和经济社会发展各项任务极为繁重艰巨。
mt: Over the past year, the world's unprecedented changes and the global epidemic of pneumococcal pneumonia have intertwined, the external environment has become more complicated and severe, and the prevention and control of pneumococcal pneumonia at home and the tasks of economic and social development are extremely heavy and arduous.

src: 以习近平同志为核心的党中央坚持统筹国内国际两个大局，坚持稳中求进工作总基调，沉着应对百年变局和世纪疫情，统筹疫情防控和经济社会发展，加快构建新发展格局，强化宏观政策跨周期调节，着力促进经济持续健康发展，着力深化改革开放创新，奋力完成改革发展艰巨任务，党和国家各项事业取得了新的重大成就。
mt: The Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, with Comrade Xi Jinping at its core, has persisted in coordinating the two major issues at home and abroad, maintained the overall tone of its work in steady pursuit of progress, steadily responded to the changing circumstances of the century and the epidemic situation of the century, coordinated the prevention and control of epidemics and economic and social development, accelerated the construction of a new development pattern, strengthened macroeconomic policy adjustment across cycles, worked hard to promote the sustained healthy development of the economy, worked hard to deepen reform and opening-up innovation, worked hard to accomplish the arduous tasks of reform and development, and achieved major new achievements in various undertakings of the Party and the Party.

src: “十四五”实现良好开局，一个重要方面体现在，构建新发展格局迈出新步伐，高质量发展取得新成效。
mt: An important aspect of the "14th Five-Year Plan" is to build a new development pattern, take a new step and achieve new results in economic development.

src: 我国经济发展和疫情防控保持全球领先地位，发展韧性强、潜力大、动力足的特点持续显现；国家战略科技力量加快壮大，重大创新成果竞相涌现，科技创新能力持续提升，关键核心技术攻关实现新突破；产业链韧性得到提升，对外贸易量增质升，结构继续优化，以新产业新业态新模式为代表的新动能成长壮大；改革开放向纵深推进，着力打通制约供需适配和要素流动的堵点，以高水平对外开放打造合作竞争新优势；民生保障有力有效，就业规模持续扩大，居民收入增长与经济增长基本同步，全年粮食连续7年保持在1.3万亿斤以上，喜获“十八连丰 ” ； 生态文明建设持续推进，碳达峰碳中和工作统筹推进，绿色低碳转型步伐稳健，生态环境保护取得新成效。
mt: China's economic development and epidemic prevention and control have maintained a leading position in the world, and the characteristics of strong resilience, great potential and strong dynamism have continued to emerge; the country's strategic scientific and technological forces have accelerated and strengthened, major innovation achievements have emerged in competition with each other, the capacity for scientific and technological innovation has continued to be enhanced, and new breakthroughs have been achieved in key core technology offensives; the resilience of the industrial chain has been enhanced, the quality of foreign trade has been increased, the structure has continued to be optimized, and new dynamic energy, represented by new industries and new business patterns, has grown and strengthened; the reform and opening-up process has been advanced in depth, and efforts have been made to plug the bottlenecks that restrict supply and demand adaptation and the

src: 这些成绩的取得，是以习近平同志为核心的党中央坚强领导的结果，是习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想科学指引的结果，是全党全国各族人民勠力同心、艰苦奋斗的结果。
mt: The achievement of these achievements is the result of the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee, with Comrade Xi Jinping as its core, the result of the scientific guidance of the Chinese Communist Party's (CCP) Strategy Paper, and the result of the hard work and hard struggle of the people of all ethnic groups throughout the Party.

src: 实践再次证明，党确立习近平同志党中央的核心、全党的核心地位，确立习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的指导地位，对新时代党和国家事业发展、对推进中华民族伟大复兴历史进程具有决定性意义。
mt: Practice has once again proved that the Party has established the core of Comrade Xi's Party Central Committee and the core of the entire Party, and that it has established the guiding position of the Chinese People's Republic's Development Strategy, which is of decisive significance for the development of the Party and its undertakings in the new era and for the historical process of promoting the great revival of the Chinese nation.

src: 有习近平总书记作为党中央的核心、全党的核心领航掌舵，有习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想科学指引，有全党全国各族人民团结一心、顽强奋斗，我们就一定能够战胜各种艰难险阻，在全面建设社会主义现代化国家新征程上创造新的时代辉煌、铸就新的历史伟业。
mt: With the President-in-Office of the Communist Party of China as the core of the CPC Central Committee, the leadership and steering wheel of the entire Party, the scientific guidance of the Chinese People's Revolutionary Party and the unity and tenacity of the people of all ethnic groups throughout the Party, we will surely be able to overcome all kinds of difficulties and obstacles and create a new era of splendour and a new historic great task on the new quest of building a socialist modernized country in an all-round manner.

src: 明年将召开党的二十大，这是党和国家政治生活中的一件大事。
mt: Next year the 20th Party Congress will be convened, which is an important event in the political life of the Party and the Party.

src: 弘扬伟大建党精神，坚持稳中求进工作总基调，完整、准确、全面贯彻新发展理念，加快构建新发展格局，全面深化改革开放，坚持创新驱动发展，推动高质量发展，坚持以供给侧结构性改革为主线，统筹疫情防控和经济社会发展，统筹发展和安全，继续做好“六稳 ” 、 “六保”工作，持续改善民生，着力稳定宏观经济大盘，保持经济运行在合理区间，保持社会大局稳定，我们就一定能保持平稳健康的经济环境、国泰民安的社会环境、风清气正的政治环境，以优异成绩迎接党的二十大胜利召开。
mt: To carry forward the great founding spirit of the Party, to adhere to the overall tone of steady pursuit of work, to implement the new development philosophy in a complete, accurate and comprehensive manner, to accelerate the construction of a new development pattern, to open up the process of reform and opening-up, to adhere to innovation-driven development, to promote the improvement of economic development, to adhere to supply-side structural reform as the main line, to coordinate the prevention and control of epidemics and economic and social development, to coordinate development and security, to continue to do well in the "six-steady" and "six-guarantee" work, to continuously improve people's livelihoods, to work hard to stabilize the macroeconomic system, to keep the economy operating within a reasonable range and to keep the social situation stable, we will surely be able to maintain

src: 让我们更加紧密地团结在以习近平同志为核心的党中央周围，增强“四个意识 ” 、 坚定“四个自信 ” 、 做到“两个维护 ” ， 不断提高政治判断力、政治领悟力、政治执行力，以实际行动把党中央决策部署落实到位，不断把新时代中国特色社会主义事业推向前进。
mt: Let us unite more closely around the Central Committee, which is centered around Comrade Xi Jinping, strengthen the “four consciousnesses,” firmly uphold the “four self-confidence,” and do the “two maintenance,” constantly improve our political judgment, political understanding, and political execution, and implement the decision-making and deployment of the Central Committee in real action, continuously pushing forward the cause of socialism with Chinese characteristics in a new era.

src: 伊朗总统：若解除对伊制裁 伊核谈判有望达成协议-新华网
mt: Iranian President: If sanctions against Iran are lifted Iranian nuclear negotiations are expected to reach an agreement

src: 新华社德黑兰12月11日电（记者高文成 王守宝）伊朗总统莱希11日在伊朗首都德黑兰说，如果美国解除对伊制裁，伊朗核问题全面协议谈判就可以达成“良好协议 ” 。
mt: Tehran, Dec. 11 (Xinhua) – Iranian President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad said on December 11 in Tehran that a “good deal” could be reached by negotiating a comprehensive agreement on Iran’s nuclear issue if the United States lifts sanctions on Iran.

src: 据伊朗总统网站发布的消息，莱希当天在与伊朗驻周边国家使节开会时说，通过向伊核协议其他相关方提交提案，伊朗已经证明了自己的谈判诚意。
mt: In a meeting with Iranian envoys in the region on the same day, Lehi said Iran had proved its negotiating spirit by submitting proposals to other parties to the Iranian nuclear deal, according to the Iranian president's website.

src: 如果美方下定决心 ， “ 达成协议的道路就将畅通 ” 。
mt: If the US is determined, “the road to agreement will be clear.”

src: 伊核协议相关方今年4月开始在奥地利首都维也纳举行会谈，讨论美伊两国恢复履约问题。
mt: The parties to the Iran nuclear deal began talks in April in Vienna, the Austrian capital, to discuss the resumption of U.S.-Iran talks.

src: 新一轮会谈11月29日在维也纳开始举行，12月3日暂时休会，9日继续举行。
mt: A new round of talks began in Vienna on 29 November, was suspended on 3 December, and resumed on 9 December.

src: 美亚裔团体投诉耶鲁等3所常春藤名校招生歧视-新华网
mt: Asian-American Association for the Prevention of Torture and Other Cruel, Inhuman or Degrading Treatment or Punishment

src: 新华社华盛顿５月２３日电（记者徐剑梅）美国１３０多个亚裔团体２３日向美国教育部和司法部提交申诉，抗议３所常春藤名校 — — 耶鲁大学、布朗大学和达特茅斯学院在招生过程中歧视亚裔申请学生。
mt: More than 130 Asian-American groups filed a complaint with the U.S. Department of Education and the U.S. Department of Justice on May 23 to protest the discriminatory admissions practices of three prestigious universities in the United States: Yale University, Brown University and Dartmouth College.

src: 牵头发起申诉的亚裔教育联盟当天在华盛顿召开新闻发布会。
mt: The Asian Education League, which brought the complaint, held a press conference in Washington on the same day.

src: 该团体主席赵宇空在发布会上说，过去１０年里，符合美国名校录取条件的亚裔申请人数量成倍增长，但在这３所美国名校中，亚裔所占比例基本维持在同一水平。
mt: The group's chairman, Zhao Yuqing, said at the conference that the number of Asian applicants who met the admission criteria for top US universities had doubled in the past decade, but the proportion of Asians in the top three US universities remained essentially the same.

src: 许多研究表明，这些高校在所谓“综合考量”的招生过程中 ， “ 长期持续性以及系统化地歧视亚裔申请学生 ” 。
mt: Many studies have shown that these institutions “continuously and systematically discriminate against Asian applicants” in their so-called “comprehensive consideration” admissions process.

src: 赵宇空介绍说，２０１４年桑德斯等学者的研究显示，在这３所高校里，相对申请者人数，亚裔在所有族裔中录取率最低。
mt: A 2014 study by scholars such as Sanders showed Asians had the lowest admission rates among all ethnic groups in the three universities, Zhao said.

src: 美国教育部的数据也显示，在所有常春藤盟校中，布朗大学和达特茅斯学院对亚裔学生的录取比例最低，耶鲁大学和布朗大学对亚裔申请学生实施了事实上的种族配额达２０年以上。
mt: Data from the U.S. Department of Education also show that among all the Ivy League schools, Brown University and Dartmouth College have the lowest enrollment rates for Asian students, and Yale and Brown have implemented de facto racial quotas for Asian applicants for more than 20 years.

src: 赵宇空告诉新华社记者，他们期望提交申诉后，美国教育部、司法部能够展开调查，并在认定事实后采取措施阻止这些高校继续在招生中歧视亚裔。
mt: Zhao told Xinhua that they hoped that after submitting the complaint, the U.S. Department of Education and the U.S. Department of Justice would investigate and, after establishing the facts, take measures to stop these universities from continuing to discriminate against Asians in admissions.

src: 他们也期望被投诉高校能够主动重视这一问题，改变对亚裔的招生政策。
mt: They also hoped that the complained universities would take the matter seriously and change their admission policies for Asians.

src: 目前，被投诉的３所高校尚未作出回应。
mt: At present, the three universities complained have not responded.

src: 亚裔教育联盟成立于２０１５年，当时曾投诉哈佛大学招生歧视，但美国教育部以程序理由未予受理。
mt: The Association for Asian Education, founded in 2015, filed a complaint against Harvard University's enrollment discrimination, but the U.S. Department of Education denied the complaint on procedural grounds.

src: 此次参与申诉的除美国华裔团体外，还包括美国印度裔、韩裔、日裔、巴基斯坦裔教育团体。
mt: In addition to the Chinese-American groups involved in the complaint, there are also Indian-American, Korean-American, Japanese-American, and Pakistani-American educational groups.

src: 女孩当箭靶为姐姐募捐 : " 想到是皮肉伤也就还好 " - 新华网
mt: "I'm sorry to hear that, but I'm glad to hear that," he said. "I'm sorry to hear that, but I'm sorry to hear that, but I'm sorry to hear that, but I'm sorry to hear that, but I'm sorry to hear that, but I'm sorry to hear that, but I'm sorry to hear that, but I'm sorry to hear that, but I'm sorry to hear that, but I'm sorry to hear that, but I'm sorry to hear that, but I'm sorry to hear that, but I'm sorry to hear that, but I'm sorry to hear that, but I'm sorry to hear that, but I'm sorry to hear that, but I'm sorry to hear that, but I'm sorry to hear that, but I'm sorry to hear that, but I'm

src: 杭州武林广场一女孩站在一块大木板前头，木板上写有“人肉靶子，十元一箭”字样。
mt: A girl stands in front of a large wooden board in Hangzhou's Wulin Square with the words "human flesh target, ten yuan one arrow" written on it.

src: 昨日上午，一则“杭州女孩甘当‘箭靶’为姐募捐”的照片刷爆朋友圈。
mt: Yesterday morning, a photo of "Hangzhou girl Gan Dan 'arrow target' for her sister's donation" blew up the circle of friends.

src: 照片显示，杭州武林广场一女孩站在一块比人略高的大木板前头，木板上写有“人肉靶子，十元一箭”字样，示意路人付款后可使用弓箭射击。
mt: The photo shows a girl standing in front of a wooden board slightly taller than a person in Hangzhou's Wulin Square, with the words "human flesh target, ten yuan one arrow" written on the board, indicating that pedestrians can use bow and arrow fire after paying.

src: 该行为引发网友热议。
mt: The incident sparked controversy amongst online users.

src: 昨晚，杭州市公安局下城分局宣传负责人向新京报记者证实，警方确认该女孩为姐姐募捐才做出这样的过激举动，但这种行为并不值得提倡，经告诫后，该女孩昨日已经离开当地派出所。
mt: Last night, the head of publicity for the downtown branch of Hangzhou Public Security Bureau confirmed to reporters in Xinjing that the police confirmed that the girl raised money for her sister to make such an outrageous move, but the behavior is not worth promoting, the girl has left the local police station yesterday after being warned.

src: 女孩街头“箭靶”募捐被告诫
mt: Girls on the Streets "Arrow Target" Donation Admonition

src: 网传图片中，一位长发女孩呈“个”字型站在一块大木板前，木板上用黑色墨水写有“人肉靶子，十元一箭”的字样，她身前另一块木板上写有其银行账号与微信、支付宝账号等。
mt: In the video, a long-haired girl stands in front of a large wooden board with the words "human flesh target, ten yuan one arrow" written on it in black ink, and she has her bank account and WeChat account, pay treasure account, etc. on the other board.

src: 该图片上网后引发争议。
mt: The picture sparked controversy after it was posted on the Internet.

src: 有网友认为，此举系“博眼球的乞讨行为 ” ， 也有不少网友对此表示同情。
mt: Some netizens viewed the move as “an eye-opening act of begging,” and many expressed sympathy.

src: “我们是23日上午10点左右巡逻到广场旁的时候发现的情况，当时围观群众已经不少了 。 ”
mt: “We found out when we patrolled the square around 10 a.m. on the 23rd, when there were already a lot of people around.”

src: 事发地附近的天水派出所民警接受当地媒体采访时称，摆摊的女孩子共有两名，均为20岁左右，打扮得青春靓丽。
mt: In an interview with the local media, police officers at the Tianshui police station near the scene said that there were two girls in the stalls, all around 20 years old, dressed in youthful beauty.

src: 其中，做“人肉靶子”的女孩一直在哭，求路人玩一下这个游戏；另一女孩在边上帮着吆喝，说自己这个朋友的姐姐得了白血病，现在急需手术费，请大家帮忙。
mt: Among them, the girl who was the "target of human flesh" was crying, asking passers-by to play the game; the other girl at the side shouted, saying that her friend's sister had leukemia, now urgently needed surgery, please help everyone.

src: “我们与贵州当地警方取得联系，了解到该女孩是在为姐姐白血病治疗募捐 。 ”
mt: “We contacted the local police in Guizhou and learned that the girl was collecting donations for her sister’s leukemia treatment.”

src: 昨晚，杭州市公安局下城分局宣传负责人告诉新京报记者，这名女孩名为吉佳丽，为姐姐吉佳艳募捐。
mt: Last night, the head of publicity of the downtown branch of Hangzhou Public Security Bureau told reporters in Xinjing News that the girl's name is Ji Jiali, for her sister Ji Jia Yan.

src: 但由于治疗仍需要30余万费用，一时想不到好的办法募捐，才做出了这种行为。
mt: But with treatment still costing more than $300,000, it took a while to think of a good way to raise money.

src: 他说，全过程中，两个女孩一个当靶子，一个负责打下手，但并未参与其中，全过程中未发现有人射箭，只是有人围观并拍了照片发到了微博上。
mt: He said that during the whole process, the two girls, one as a target, one responsible for launching, but did not participate in the whole process, no one found an arrow, only someone surrounded and took a photo posted on the microblogging.

src: 后警方经治安部门鉴定，使用的弓箭不属管制范畴。
mt: After the police were appraised by the security department, the use of bows and arrows was not controlled.

src: 该负责人表示 ， “ 不提倡采取这种博眼球募捐方式 ” 。
mt: The person in charge stated that "there is no advocacy for this kind of open-minded fund-raising".

src: 经派出所民警告诫后，她已经离开派出所。
mt: After being warned by the police, she left the police station.

src: 不要把人吓倒在起跑线-新华网
mt: Don't frighten people on the starting line - Official website

src: 逛书市时，往往能感受到成功学类书籍的火爆。
mt: When you go to the bookstore, you can often feel the burst of success books.

src: 现今的成功学书籍，很多宣扬的都是“最好原则 ” — —即先假定或暗示你能“做到 ” ， 然后再告诉你需要做到的事情“是什么 ” 。
mt: Many of today’s successful textbooks preach “best principles” – that is, assuming or implying that you can “do it,” and then telling you “what it is” that you need to do.

src: 等于说一下子越过了“如何做到”这个其实最重要、最根本的环节。
mt: It's like saying that we've gone beyond the "how to" part, which is really the most important and fundamental part.

src: 正因如此，这些书都有一个共同的特点 — — 要么就一鼓作气地干到最好，要么就干脆什么也别干；要么就是100，要么就是0；要么你就登泰山，要么你就干脆在原地待着。
mt: That’s why these books have one thing in common – either do your best at it, or do nothing at all; either 100, or 0; or you climb Mount Tai, or you stay where you are.

src: 这种“最好原则 ” ， 让谁看都会承认“正确无比 ” ， 但是99%的人都会被吓倒在起跑线前。
mt: This “best principle” is recognized as “excellently correct” by anyone who sees it, but 99% of people are frightened to the finish line.

src: 因为这种理论鼓吹的是一种“你要痛下决心，重新做人，来个180度的大转变”的路径，而这恰恰是很多人的致命弱项。
mt: Because this theory advocates a path of “making up your mind, reinventing yourself, making a big 180-degree shift,” which is precisely what many people’s fatal weaknesses are.

src: 对于墨守成规、因循守旧、拒绝变化的人，你偏偏要在他的耳旁大喊“你要转变 ” ， 无疑是自欺欺人、对牛弹琴之举。
mt: To a man who follows the rules, follows the old, and refuses to change, you must yell in his ear, “You must change.”

src: 绝大多数人都会在“转变”两字面前露怯，裹足不前，难下决心；又或者凭着一时的冲动痛下了“转变”之决心，并勇敢地迈出了第一步，但往往是好景不长，坚持不了多一会儿就败下阵来，难见持续性。
mt: The vast majority of people are shy and unable to make up their minds when faced with the word change; or they may have made up their minds to change on the impulse of a moment, and have taken the first step bravely, but often in a short space of time, and then lose the battle in a short space of time.

src: 马三立先生那段著名的《从明天开始》的相声，就是最传神地表现了这一“普遍人性”的经典。
mt: The echo of Mr. Ma's famous "From Tomorrow onwards" is the most iconic expression of this "universal humanity" classic.

src: “最好原则”的最大问题在于门槛太高，它往往超越了普通人的能力极限，让绝大多数人“望门兴叹 ” 。
mt: The biggest problem with the “best principles” is that the threshold is too high, often exceeding the limits of ordinary people’s abilities, for the vast majority of people to “wail at the door.”

src: 或许 ， “ 次好原则”才是一种有可能让更多普通人走上相对成功之路的途径。
mt: Perhaps the “second-best principle” is the way to get more ordinary people onto the path to relative success.

src: “次好原则”的核心在于“降低门槛 ” — —它鼓励的是一种“积小胜为大胜”的理论，即如果做不到100，只做到1也行：因为1永远大于0；如果登不上泰山，只登上你家门口的小沙丘也行，因为那也总比原地踏步强。
mt: At the heart of the “second-best principle” is “reducing the threshold” – which encourages a “win-win-win” theory, that is, if you can’t do 100, you can only do one: because one is always greater than zero; and if you can’t climb Mount Tai, you can only climb the little dunes at your doorstep, because that’s always better than walking.

src: 总之，只要你做了点什么，就总比不做强。
mt: Anyway, as long as you do something, it's always better than not doing it.

src: 由于门槛大幅度降低，因此就多了使普通人做到坚持的可能性，而凡事只要坚持，成功概率也会加大。
mt: Because the threshold has been greatly reduced, there is much more chance that ordinary people will stick to it, and the probability of success will increase as long as everything sticks to it.

src: 只不过遵循“次好原则”的成功之路，其路程略长一些而已。
mt: The road to success is just a little longer, following the “second-best principle.”

src: 总而言之 ， “ 最好原则”尽管在表面上打着让所有人都成功的旗号，但它最终能够激励的，实际上还是少数；而“次好原则 ” ， 才能有效激励更多的人，尽可能地让更多人受益。
mt: In short, the “best principle,” while ostensibly a banner of success for all, ultimately inspires few, if any, people; and the “second-best principle,” in effect, inspires more people and benefits them as much as possible.

src: 习近平向2021年大湾区科学论坛致贺信-新华网
mt: "Support for the 2019 Gulf Science Forum".

src: 新华社北京12月11日电 12月11日，国家主席习近平向2021年大湾区科学论坛致贺信。
mt: China's President Xi Jinping sent a letter of congratulations to the Bay Area Science Forum in 2021.

src: 习近平指出，当今世界正经历百年未有之大变局，全球科技创新进入密集活跃期，新一轮科技革命和产业变革对全球经济结构产生了深刻影响。
mt: Xi pointed out that today’s world is undergoing unprecedented changes. Global technological innovation has entered an intensive period of activity, and a new round of technological revolution and industrial change has profoundly affected the global economic structure.

src: 粤港澳大湾区要围绕建设国际科技创新中心战略定位，努力建设全球科技创新高地，推动新兴产业发展。
mt: Guangdong, Hong Kong, Macao and the Gulf region should focus on the strategic positioning of the construction of the international center of scientific and technological innovation, strive to build a global high ground of scientific and technological innovation, and promote the development of new industries.

src: 中国愿同世界各国科学家、国际科技组织一道，密切国际科技交流合作，加强重大科学问题研究，促进共性科学技术破解，深化重点科学项目协作，共同推进世界科学事业发展，更好造福人类。
mt: Together with scientists from all over the world and international scientific and technological organizations, China is willing to closely exchange and cooperate in international science and technology, strengthen research on major scientific problems, promote the breakthrough of common science and technology, deepen cooperation on key scientific projects, and jointly promote the development of world scientific undertakings and better serve humanity.

src: 2021年大湾区科学论坛当日在广东省广州市开幕，主题为“探索未来，共享科学 ” ， 由广东省人民政府主办。
mt: The 2021 Dawan Science Forum will be held in Guangzhou, Guangdong Province, on the theme of “Exploring the Future, Sharing Science.”

src: 广西大学生休学创业年限最长可达５年-新华网
mt: The maximum length of time a student can stay in the university is five years.

src: 新华社南宁５月１９日专电（记者张莺）记者近日从广西壮族自治区教育厅获悉，今后广西各高校将实施弹性学制，放宽大学生休学年限，在校生休学创业的年限在原有学制基础上可延长２至５年，休学创业时间可视为实践教育时间。
mt: Xinhua News Agency (Xinhua News Agency) has learned from the Education Department of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region on May 19 that universities in Guangxi will implement a flexible education system in the future, relaxing the period for university students to leave school, the period for students to leave school to start a business can be extended from two to five years on the basis of the original education system, and the period for students to leave school to start a business can be regarded as the time for practical education.

src: 为促进大学生创业创新能力提升，广西教育、人社等部门合力搭建创业平台，建设更多大学生校外实践教学基地、大学科技园、大学生创业园、创业孵化基地等，给大学生创业提供外在保障。
mt: In order to promote the ability of university students to entrepreneurship and innovation, Guangxi education, human society and other departments have jointly set up entrepreneurship platforms, built more university students' out-of-school practice teaching bases, university science and technology parks, university students' entrepreneurship parks, entrepreneurship incubation bases, and so on, to provide university students with external guarantees for entrepreneurship.

src: 根据要求，到２０２０年，各高校创新创业实践基地面积，本科学校要达到３０００平方米以上，高职学校要达到２０００平方米以上。
mt: According to the requirement, by 2020, each university's innovation and entrepreneurship practice base area, undergraduate schools should reach more than 3000 square meters, vocational schools should reach more than 2000 square meters.

src: 政府鼓励高校设立创新创业学分，优先支持在创新创业实践中表现优异的学生转专业。
mt: The government encourages universities to set up innovation and entrepreneurship credits, and gives priority to supporting students who excel in innovation and entrepreneurship practices to transfer to professional fields.

src: 高校教师每两年要至少有两个月到行业企业挂职锻炼，以此提高教师创新创业教育的意识和能力。
mt: In order to improve the consciousness and ability of teachers to innovate and start-up education, teachers in universities and colleges should take at least two months every two years to engage in vocational training in industry enterprises.

src: 自治区教育厅要求广西各高校深入实施大学生创新创业训练计划，力争使每一名大学生在校期间都参与一项创新创业训练计划。
mt: The Office of Education of the Autonomous Region demands Guangxi universities to implement the university students' innovation and entrepreneurship training program in depth, striving to make every university student participate in an innovation and entrepreneurship training program while in school.

src: 高校要积极组织学生参加各级各类创新创业竞赛，并给予经费支持。
mt: Universities should actively organize students to participate in innovation and entrepreneurship competitions at all levels and provide financial support.
